Method Detail

getInstance

public static SimpleGeoPlacesClient getInstance(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                java.lang.String port,
                                                java.lang.String apiVersion)
Method that ensures we only have one instance of the SimpleGeoPlacesClient instantiated. Also allows server connection variables to be overridden.

Parameters:
baseUrl - String api.simplegeo.com is default, but can be overridden.
port - String 80 is default, but can be overridden.
apiVersion - String 1.0 is default, but can be overridden.
Returns:
SimpleGeoPlacesClient

getInstance

public static SimpleGeoPlacesClient getInstance()
Default method for retrieving a SimpleGeoPlacesClient.

Returns:
SimpleGeoPlacesClient

Parameters:
point - Point Point
query - String A term/phrase to search for
category - String A type of place to search for
radius - double A distance in kilometers used to restrict searches

java.io.IOException

Parameters:
address - String Physical address, such as 41 Decatur St, San Francisco, CA

category - String A type of place to search for
radius - double A distance in kilometers used to restrict searches
Returns:
FeatureCollection FeatureCollection containing search results.
